name: Frigg's Rune
description:
Take command of a fierce norse warrior who had the unfortunate luck of aiding Frigg in her unfaithfulness against her husband Odin.

Your offspring is an abomination, and left to the hands of Odin it will grow to be a mighty beast.

Fight your way through Asgard and right your wrongs!

Control Scheme:

Left handThumbsRight HandWASDSpaceJIO

Big shout out to all the people that helped this become a reality:
